name: Flying Snake
speed: walk: 30 ft., fly: 60 ft., swim: 30 ft.

traits.name: Flyby
traits.description: The snake doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 piercing damage plus 7 (3d4) poison damage.
